other_tests.findings: Heterozygous H223R mutation identified in all three affected individuals.
Radiographic evidence for progressive bowing of legs, widened and eroded metaphyses, abnormalities simulating rickets.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Bowing worsened progressively since walking was delayed until 19 months.

other_tests.findings: Narrowing of the upper chest leading to a 'bell-shaped' thorax deformity.
Nephrocalcinosis observed in all three patients.
